nodes.text: House Depon was a Kuati noble house that was a rival of the Kuati family House Andrim. At some point during the reign of the Galactic Empire, House Adrim sent a representative to the Belgaroth system, to spy on weapons tests that were to be performed by the Star Destroyers Burning Vengeance and Legacy. However, House Depon secretly murdered House Andrim's agent and replaced the operative with an impersonator.
